name: Crypto Kart Racing
description: 🚘 CRYPTO KART RACING 🚘 The FIRST P2E game on CRO, using Cronos Play. Play now - www.cryptokartracing.com/playIf you liked Mario Kart, then you’ll LOVE this!!💰Real Play-2-Earn✅Unique 3D created characters   🚘Fully 3D karts 🛤Multiple tracks  🚀Integrated NFTs - including cosmetic upgrades, playable characters, vehicles & unique effects!   ⚔️Multiplayer tournaments - PVP or PVE   💴Championships and tournaments with huge cash prizes ($5,000+)   ♥️Twitch and YouTube gaming ambassadors   📱Mobile versions of the game   ✅Massive Marketing  plans
